summary: This bill, H.R. 4873, introduced in the House of Representatives on August 5, 2025, aims to codify Executive Order 14319. The Executive Order addresses the prevention of 'woke AI' within the Federal Government, making its provisions legally binding. The bill's sponsor is Mr. Patronis, and it was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform. The bill seeks to enshrine the principles of the Executive Order into law.
